properties.name: git-vision.app.jwt.secret
properties.description: Secret key used to sign and verify JWT tokens.

properties.name: git-vision.app.jwt.expiration
properties.description: JWT token expiration time in milliseconds.

properties.name: spring.datasource.init.mode
properties.description: Database initialization mode for Spring Boot (e.g., always, never).

properties.name: aes.secret.key
properties.description: Secret key used for AES encryption and decryption operations.

properties.name: cors.allowed-origins
properties.description: Comma-separated list of allowed origins for CORS requests.

properties.name: cors.allow-credentials
properties.description: Indicates whether user credentials (cookies, authorization headers) are allowed in CORS requests.
